name: DELIVERY_FEE_BY_GLOVO
description: Delivery fee Glovo charges the customer, shown on the invoice Glovo issues to the customer. Taxable. How it's calculated depends on the business model: In simpler models (Default/BM1/BM8), it's exactly what the customer paid in DELIVERY_FEE_BY_CUSTOMER. In courier-direct models (BM2/BM5), Glovo only charges for the portion not already invoiced by the courier to the customer. In BM4, this isn't used - instead SERVICE_FEE_TO_CUSTOMER is charged. Example: Customer sees €4 delivery fee on their Glovo invoice.

name: DELIVERY_FEE_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Delivery fee the courier bills directly to the customer. Taxable. Only used in business models BM2/BM4/BM5 where couriers invoice customers directly (GEN2 models). The amount depends on what the customer paid vs what the courier earned: if the courier's payment (CPO) is less than customer's delivery fees, the courier invoices the customer for their portion. Example: Courier bills customer €3.50 directly for delivery service.

name: DELIVERY_FEE_BY_COURIER
description: Payment courier invoices to Glovo for completing a delivery. Taxable. NET amount (after tax). Amount depends on business model: In simpler models (Default/BM1/BM8), it matches exactly what Glovo owes the courier from ORDER_EARNINGS_TO_COURIER. In courier-direct models (BM2/BM5), it's the remainder after subtracting what the customer already paid the courier directly. BM4 handles this differently. Example: Courier bills Glovo €4.50 for completing a delivery.

name: DELIVERY_FEE_TO_GLOVO
description: Internal accounting entry to balance the money flow when customer pays delivery fees but courier gets the earnings. Non-taxable (just balancing the books). Only used in BM2/BM4/BM5. The amount ensures all the money flows add up correctly between customer, courier, and Glovo. This doesn't result in a real invoice sent to anyone - it's purely for internal accounting. Example: Helps balance when customer paid €4 delivery fee and courier earned €3.50.

name: MPL_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_GLOVO
description: Delivery fee Glovo charges customer in marketplace model where partner handles their own delivery (not Glovo couriers). Non-taxable balance. Comes directly from DELIVERY_FEE_BY_CUSTOMER (same amount). Used in Default business model when order is marketplace. Example: Customer pays €3 delivery fee that goes to the partner's delivery service.

name: MPL_DELIVERY_FEE_TO_PARTNER
description: Payment Glovo makes to partner for handling their own delivery. Non-taxable balance. Comes from DELIVERY_FEE_TO_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Used in marketplace model when partner handles delivery instead of Glovo couriers - partner receives the delivery fee collected from customer. Example: Partner receives €3 for handling delivery themselves.

name: MPL_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_GLOVO_TAXABLE
description: Delivery fee Glovo charges customer for VAT-optimised Gen 2 cases. Service tax is applied. Example: Customer pays €3 delivery fee that goes to the partner's delivery service.

name: MPL_DELIVERY_FEE_TO_PARTNER_TAXABLE
description: Payment Glovo makes to partner for handling their own delivery. Apply food tax. For Gen2 orders to vat optimise

name: PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_GLOVO
description: Delivery fee discount Glovo gives to customer (like 'Free Delivery' promotions). Taxable. In simple models (Default/BM1/BM8), comes directly from PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_GLOVO (same amount). In BM2/BM5, the calculation adjusts for courier and promotion interactions. Appears as negative amount on customer's invoice. Example: -€3.50 delivery discount sponsored by Glovo.

name: PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_TO_PARTNER
description: Fee Glovo charges partner for a delivery promotion the partner sponsored. Non-taxable balance. Comes from PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Used in BM2/BM5. Example: Partner offered 'free delivery' to attract customers, so Glovo invoices them €3 for that discount.

name: PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_TO_PARTNER_TAXABLE
description: Fee Glovo charges partner for a delivery promotion the partner sponsored. Taxable version used in countries where promotions must be taxed. Comes from PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Used in BM2/BM5. Example: Partner offered 'free delivery', Glovo invoices them €3 as taxable service.

name: PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Delivery fee discount shown to customer. Non-taxable balance version. In Default model, comes from partner-sponsored promotions. In BM2/BM5, represents partner-sponsored portion after complex promotion calculations. Used in specific countries with non-taxable promotion rules. Example: -€2 discount appears on customer invoice.

name: PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_TO_CUSTOMER_TAXABLE
description: Delivery fee discount shown to customer. Taxable version used in countries where promotions must be taxed. Comes from PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_GLOVO in Default model. Example: -€3.50 taxable delivery discount appears on customer invoice.

name: PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_TO_COURIER
description: Glovo compensates courier for a delivery fee promotion. When promotion affects courier's earnings, we split PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_GLOVO money movement into multiple invoicing items - this one compensates the courier. Non-taxable balance.

name: PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_COURIER
description: Delivery fee discount courier passes to customer. Non-taxable balance. Used in BM2/BM5 when total promotions exceed what courier would have charged. The amount is calculated to balance out the promotion flows between Glovo, courier, and customer. Example: -€2 discount shows on courier's invoice to customer.

name: PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_COURIER_SPONSORED_BY_PARTNER
description: Partner-sponsored delivery discount that courier passes to customer. Non-taxable balance. Only used in BM5. Partner pays for the promotion, courier shows it on their invoice to customer. Example: -€1.50 partner-funded discount on courier's invoice.

name: PROMOTION_DELIVERY_FEE_BY_COURIER_SPONSORED_BY_GLOVO
description: Glovo-sponsored delivery discount that courier passes to customer. Non-taxable balance. Only used in BM5. Glovo pays for the promotion, courier shows it on their invoice to customer. Example: -€2 Glovo-funded discount on courier's invoice.

name: BAD_WEATHER_SURCHARGE_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Extra fee Glovo charges customer for deliveries during bad weather. Taxable. Comes directly from BAD_WEATHER_SURCHARGE_BY_CUSTOMER money movement (same amount). Used across all business models. Example: Customer pays €2 extra for delivery during rainstorm.

name: BAD_WEATHER_SURCHARGE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo pays the partner the bad weather surcharge that was collected from customer. Comes from BAD_WEATHER_SURCHARGE_TO_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Partner receives the bad weather fee.

name: BAD_WEATHER_SURCHARGE_TO_PARTNER_TAXABLE
description: Glovo pays the partner the bad weather surcharge that was collected from customer. Comes from BAD_WEATHER_SURCHARGE_TO_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Food VAT is applied for VAT optimisation. Partner receives the bad weather fee.

name: PROMOTION_BAD_WEATHER_SURCHARGE_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo gives discount to customer for bad weather surcharge (Glovo-sponsored promotion). Comes from PROMOTION_BAD_WEATHER_SURCHARGE_BY_GLOVO money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Shows as negative amount on invoice.

name: MINIMUM_BASKET_SURCHARGE_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Fee Glovo charges customer when order total is below the minimum basket requirement. Taxable. Comes directly from MINIMUM_BASKET_SURCHARGE_BY_CUSTOMER money movement (same amount). Used across all business models. Example: Customer orders €12 but minimum is €15, so customer pays €3 surcharge.

name: MINIMUM_BASKET_SURCHARGE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo pays the partner the minimum basket surcharge that was collected from customer. Comes from MINIMUM_BASKET_SURCHARGE_TO_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Partner receives the surcharge fee.

name: MINIMUM_BASKET_SURCHARGE_TO_PARTNER_TAXABLE
description: Glovo pays the partner the minimum basket surcharge that was collected from customer. Comes from MINIMUM_BASKET_SURCHARGE_TO_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Food VAT is applied and introduced to the commission calculation for VAT optimisation. Partner receives the surcharge fee.

name: PROMOTION_MINIMUM_BASKET_SURCHARGE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges the partner for waiving the minimum basket surcharge (partner-sponsored). Comes from PROMOTION_MINIMUM_BASKET_SURCHARGE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Partner pays to waive the €3 surcharge for their customers.

name: PROMOTION_MINIMUM_BASKET_SURCHARGE_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo gives customer a discount on minimum basket surcharge. Based on PROMOTION_MINIMUM_BASKET_SURCHARGE_BY_PARTNER. Non-taxable balance. When partner waives the fee, one money movement becomes two invoicing items: partner gets charged by Glovo, customer sees the discount.

name: PRICING_SERVICE_FEE_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo charges customer a platform service fee. Comes from PRICING_SERVICE_FEE_BY_CUSTOMER money movement (same amount). Taxable. Example: €1.50 fee for using the Glovo platform to process the order.

name: SERVICE_FEE_PAID_IN_CASH_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner when customer paid service fee in cash to partner. Comes from SERVICE_FEE_PAID_IN_CASH_REDUCE_BALANCE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Reduces partner's balance with Glovo since they received cash directly.

name: PRODUCTS_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo pays the partner for products sold. Comes from PRODUCTS_TO_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: Restaurant sells €45 worth of food through Glovo, this is the invoice showing Glovo paying them.

name: PRODUCTS_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo charges customer for products purchased. Comes from PRODUCTS_BY_CUSTOMER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: Customer buys €50 of groceries, this shows on their Glovo invoice.

name: PRODUCTS_PAID_IN_CASH_REDUCE_BALANCE_TO_PARTNER
description: DEPRECATED. Glovo reduces partner's balance when customer paid in cash. Comes from PRODUCTS_IN_CASH_BY_CUSTOMER_REDUCE_BALANCE_BY_PARTNER money movement. Non-taxable balance. Customer gave cash directly to partner, so we reduce what Glovo owes them.

name: PRODUCTS_PAID_IN_CASH_BY_GLOVO_REDUCE_BALANCE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo reduces partner's balance when Glovo paid them in cash. Comes from PRODUCTS_IN_CASH_BY_GLOVO_REDUCE_BALANCE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Courier delivered cash to partner on Glovo's behalf.

name: PRODUCTS_PAID_IN_CASH_BY_CUSTOMER_REDUCE_BALANCE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo reduces partner's balance when customer paid in cash directly to partner. Comes from PRODUCTS_IN_CASH_BY_CUSTOMER_REDUCE_BALANCE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Since partner received cash, we reduce what Glovo owes them.

name: PRODUCTS_PAID_WITH_VOUCHER_REDUCE_BALANCE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo reduces partner's balance when customer used a voucher/gift card. Comes from PRODUCTS_PAID_WITH_VOUCHER_REDUCE_BALANCE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Glovo redeemed the voucher, so partner owes Glovo that amount.

name: PROMOTION_PRODUCT_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo gives customer a product discount (Glovo-sponsored promotion like '20% off'). Comes from PROMOTION_PRODUCT_BY_GLOVO money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Shows as negative amount. Example: -€10 discount on €50 order.

name: PROMOTION_PRODUCT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner for a product discount the partner sponsored (affects commission calculation). Comes from PROMOTION_PRODUCT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Partner pays for the discount AND pays less commission.

name: PROMOTION_PRODUCT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo shows the customer a product discount that partner sponsored. Splits PROMOTION_PRODUCT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER into two invoicing items. Non-taxable balance. Partner pays Glovo (one invoice), customer sees discount (another invoice).

name: PROMOTION_PRODUCT_NOT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner for a product discount the partner sponsored (does NOT affect commission). Comes from PROMOTION_PRODUCT_NOT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Partner pays for discount but still pays full commission.

name: PROMOTION_PRODUCT_NOT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo shows the customer a product discount that partner sponsored. Splits PROMOTION_PRODUCT_NOT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER into two invoicing items. Non-taxable balance. Partner pays Glovo (one invoice), customer sees discount (another invoice).

name: PRODUCTS_REFUND_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner for a product refund that affects commission. Comes from PRODUCTS_REFUND_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Partner pays for refund AND commission gets reduced. Example: €5 refund reduces partner earnings and commission.

name: PRODUCTS_REFUND_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo refunds the customer for product issues. Splits PRODUCTS_REFUND_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER into two invoicing items. Non-taxable balance. Partner gets charged (one invoice), customer receives refund (another invoice).

name: PRODUCTS_REFUND_NOT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner for a product refund that does NOT affect commission. Comes from PRODUCTS_REFUND_NOT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Partner pays for refund but commission calculated on original amount.

name: PRODUCTS_REFUND_NOT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo refunds the customer for product issues. Splits PRODUCTS_REFUND_NOT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER into two invoicing items. Non-taxable balance. Partner gets charged (one invoice), customer receives refund (another invoice).

name: REFUND_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo refunds the customer for order issues (missing items, quality problems, etc.). Comes from REFUND_BY_GLOVO money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: €8 refund for missing items shows on customer's account.

name: INCIDENT_PRODUCTS_NOT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo pays partner for replacement products added due to incidents (does NOT affect commission). Comes from INCIDENT_PRODUCTS_NOT_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: Partner adds €5 replacement items as goodwill, commission stays same.

name: INCIDENT_PRODUCTS_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo pays partner for replacement products added due to incidents (DOES affect commission). Comes from INCIDENT_PRODUCTS_AFFECTING_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: Partner adds €5 replacement, commission calculated on higher amount.

name: INCIDENT_COMMISSION_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo credits partner a commission adjustment due to order incident. Comes from INCIDENT_COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Taxable. NET amount. Shows as negative amount crediting partner. Example: €2 commission refund due to incident.

name: COMMISSION_TO_PARTNER
description: Commission fee Glovo charges partner for facilitating the sale. Taxable. NET amount (after tax). Comes directly from COMMISSION_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount) across all business models. In BM4 with partner, this commission may be partially offset by courier costs. Example: Partner pays Glovo €7.50 commission (15% of €50 sales).

name: ORDER_EARNINGS_BY_COURIER
description: Courier bills Glovo for delivery service (Cost Per Order / CPO). Taxable. NET amount (after tax). Used in Default/BM1/BM8. Comes directly from ORDER_EARNINGS_TO_COURIER money movement (same amount). In other business models (BM2/BM4/BM5), courier payments are handled differently. Example: Courier invoices Glovo €4.50 for completing a delivery.

name: TIP_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo shows the customer their tip amount on the invoice/receipt. Comes from TIP_BY_CUSTOMER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: Customer's receipt shows they tipped €2 to the courier.

name: WAITING_TIME_FEE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner a waiting time fee (taxable version). From WAITING_TIME_FEE_BY_PARTNER money movement, tax treatment varies by country. Taxable. NET amount. Used in countries where this fee must be taxed. Example: €2 fee when courier waited 15 extra minutes.

name: WAITING_TIME_FEE_TO_PARTNER_NON_TAXABLE
description: Glovo charges partner a waiting time fee (non-taxable version). From WAITING_TIME_FEE_BY_PARTNER money movement, tax treatment varies by country. Non-taxable balance. NET amount. Used in countries where this fee is not taxed.

name: WAITING_TIME_FEE_TAXABLE_REFUND_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo refunds partner a waiting time fee that was charged incorrectly. Comes from WAITING_TIME_FEE_TAXABLE_REFUND_TO_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Taxable. NET amount. Shows as negative amount crediting partner. Example: -€2 refund.

name: GLOVO_BALANCE_DISCOUNT_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Discount Glovo gives customer when service fee calculation results in negative amount. Taxable. Only used in BM4 without partner. When courier costs (CPO) exceed what customer paid in delivery fees, the difference becomes a discount to the customer. Example: -€2 balance discount on customer invoice.

name: SERVICE_FEE_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Platform service fee Glovo charges customer. Taxable. Only used in BM4. In BM4, this replaces DELIVERY_FEE_BY_GLOVO and the amount is calculated based on delivery fees and courier costs (CPO). In simpler terms: customer pays service fee instead of traditional delivery fee. Example: Customer pays €5 service fee to use Glovo platform.

name: GLOVO_BALANCE_DISCOUNT_TO_PARTNER
description: Discount Glovo gives partner when commission minus courier costs results in negative amount. Taxable. Only used in BM4 with aggregated invoicing model. When courier costs exceed the commission partner owes, the difference becomes a credit to the partner. Example: -€3 balance discount on partner invoice.

name: GLOVO_BALANCE_VOUCHER_TO_PARTNER
description: Credit Glovo gives partner when commission minus courier costs results in negative amount. Non-taxable balance. Only used in BM4 with standard (non-aggregated) invoicing model. Similar to GLOVO_BALANCE_DISCOUNT_TO_PARTNER but non-taxable version. Example: -€3 voucher credit to partner balance.

name: CPO_ASSUMED_BY_PARTNER
description: Courier bills partner directly for delivery service. Taxable. Only used in BM4 with standard (non-aggregated) invoicing model when courier costs exceed what customer covered. Partner assumes responsibility for remaining courier payment (CPO). Example: Courier bills partner €2 for delivery cost not covered by customer.

name: CPO_ASSUMED_TO_GLOVO
description: Fee Glovo charges partner for courier delivery costs. Taxable. Only used in BM4 with aggregated invoicing model when courier costs exceed what customer covered. Glovo pays the courier, then bills partner for the remaining amount. Example: Glovo invoices partner €2 for uncovered courier costs.

name: CPO_ASSUMED_BY_GLOVO
description: Courier bills Glovo for delivery service. Taxable. Only used in BM4 with aggregated invoicing model when courier costs exceed what customer covered. Glovo pays courier, then recoups cost from partner via CPO_ASSUMED_TO_GLOVO. Example: Courier invoices Glovo €2 which Glovo then charges to partner.

name: PRIME_ORDER_VENDOR_FEE_FROM_GLOVO_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner a Prime order vendor fee. Comes from PRIME_ORDER_VENDOR_FEE_FROM_PARTNER_TO_GLOVO money movement (same amount). Taxable. Partners pay this fee when orders come from Glovo Prime members. Example: €0.50 fee per Prime order.

name: FLASH_DEAL_FEE_FROM_GLOVO_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner for featuring products in flash deals (limited-time promotions). Comes from FLASH_DEAL_FEE_FROM_PARTNER_TO_GLOVO money movement (same amount). Taxable. Example: Partner pays €5 to feature products in 2-hour flash deal.

name: FLASH_DEAL_PROMOTION_FROM_GLOVO_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner for the flash deal discount given to customers. Comes from FLASH_DEAL_PROMOTION_FROM_PARTNER_TO_CUSTOMER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Partner pays Glovo for the 30% off they offered customers.

name: FLASH_DEAL_PROMOTION_FROM_GLOVO_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo shows customer the flash deal discount they're receiving. Splits FLASH_DEAL_PROMOTION_FROM_PARTNER_TO_CUSTOMER into two invoicing items. Non-taxable balance. Partner pays Glovo (one invoice), customer sees discount (another invoice). Example: -€6 flash deal discount.

name: PRIME_SUBSCRIPTION_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo charges customer for Prime subscription membership fee. Comes from PRIME_SUBSCRIPTION_BY_CUSTOMER money movement (same amount). Taxable. Example: Customer pays €5.99/month for Prime membership - this is the invoice line item.

name: PROMOTION_PRIME_SUBSCRIPTION_TO_CUSTOMER
description: Glovo gives customer a Prime subscription discount. Comes from PROMOTION_PRIME_SUBSCRIPTION_BY_GLOVO money movement (same amount). Taxable. Shows as negative amount. Example: -€3.00 for 50% off Prime promotion.

name: PLATFORM_FEE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner a platform usage fee for using Glovo's infrastructure. Comes from PLATFORM_FEE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Taxable. NET amount. Example: €10 monthly fee for using Glovo's ordering system.

name: SALES_FEE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner a sales-based fee (separate from commission). Comes from SALES_FEE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Taxable. NET amount. Example: Partner pays €20 for 2% sales fee on €1,000 monthly volume.

name: MATERIAL_FEE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner for materials and supplies provided (packaging, branded materials, etc.). Comes from MATERIAL_FEE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Taxable. NET amount. Example: €50 for branded packaging materials.

name: SANCTIONS_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner a sanction/penalty for policy violations or quality issues. Comes from SANCTIONS_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Taxable. NET amount. Example: €100 sanction for repeated late order preparation.

name: MKT_GMO_DEBIT_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner for advertising/marketing campaigns on the platform. Comes from MKT_GMO_DEBIT_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Taxable. NET amount. Example: Partner pays €50 for sponsored placement at top of search results for one week.

name: INSTANT_PAYOUTS_FEE_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo charges partner a fee for instant payout service (getting money immediately instead of waiting for regular payout). Comes from INSTANT_PAYOUTS_FEE_BY_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Taxable. NET amount. Example: Partner pays €5 fee to get their €500 immediately.

name: INSTANT_PAYOUTS_ALREADY_PAID_TO_PARTNER
description: Glovo records the instant payout amount already transferred to partner, reducing their balance. Comes from INSTANT_PAYOUTS_ALREADY_PAID_TO_PARTNER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. NET amount. Example: Partner received €500, their balance with Glovo reduced by €500.

name: TIP_BY_COURIER
description: Courier bills Glovo for tips received. Comes from TIP_TO_COURIER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: Courier received €3 tip, bills Glovo for it.

name: EXTERNAL_EARNINGS_BONUS_BY_COURIER
description: Courier bills Glovo for special bonuses (exceptional performance, compensation, etc.). Comes from EXTERNAL_EARNINGS_BONUS_TO_COURIER money movement (same amount). Taxable. Example: Courier bills Glovo €20 for excellent customer ratings bonus.

name: PRODUCT_INCIDENTS_BY_COURIER
description: Courier owes Glovo for product incidents they caused (damaged goods, wrong deliveries, etc.). Comes from PRODUCT_INCIDENTS_BY_COURIER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: Courier damaged €15 of products, owes Glovo for it.

name: CHALLENGE_REWARD_BY_COURIER
description: Courier bills Glovo for challenge reward (completing delivery goals). Comes from CHALLENGE_REWARD_TO_COURIER money movement (same amount). Taxable. Example: Courier completed 30 deliveries in a week, bills Glovo €25 reward.

name: REFERRAL_BY_COURIER
description: Courier bills Glovo for referring new couriers to the platform. Comes from REFERRAL_TO_COURIER money movement (same amount). Taxable. NET amount. Example: Courier referred a friend, bills Glovo €50 referral bonus.

name: ACTIVATION_FEE_TO_COURIER
description: Glovo charges courier a one-time activation fee when joining the platform. Comes from ACTIVATION_FEE_BY_COURIER money movement (same amount). Taxable. Example: New courier pays €25 to activate their account.

name: PLATFORM_FEE_TO_COURIER
description: Glovo charges courier a platform usage fee for using the courier app and infrastructure. Comes from PLATFORM_FEE_BY_COURIER money movement (same amount). Taxable. Example: Courier pays €10 weekly to use Glovo courier app.

name: SALES_FEE_TO_COURIER
description: Glovo charges courier a sales-based fee on their delivery volume or earnings. Comes from SALES_FEE_BY_COURIER money movement (same amount). Taxable. Example: Courier pays €10 for 2% sales fee on €500 weekly earnings.

name: MATERIAL_FEE_TO_COURIER
description: Glovo charges courier for materials and equipment provided (delivery bags, branded clothing, etc.). Comes from MATERIAL_FEE_BY_COURIER money movement (same amount). Taxable. Example: Courier pays €30 for insulated delivery bag.

name: FRAUD_BY_COURIER
description: Courier owes Glovo for fraudulent activities detected on their account. Comes from FRAUD_BY_COURIER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: Courier charged €50 for fake deliveries.

name: GUARANTEE_BY_COURIER
description: Courier bills Glovo for minimum earnings guarantee payment. Comes from GUARANTEE_TO_COURIER money movement (same amount). Taxable. Example: Courier only earned €40 but has €60 guarantee, bills Glovo €20 difference.

name: CASH_OUT_BY_COURIER
description: Courier's balance is reduced for cash earnings already paid out. Comes from CASH_OUT_BY_COURIER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: Courier was paid €200 in cash, their balance with Glovo reduced by €200.

name: CASH_COLLECTED_BY_COURIER
description: Courier owes Glovo for cash collected from customers (cash-on-delivery orders). Comes from CASH_COLLECTED_BY_COURIER money movement (same amount). Non-taxable balance. Example: Courier collected €150 in cash, must remit it to Glovo.

name: MKT_ACTIONS_TO_PARTNER
description: MANUAL IMPORT via CSV: Glovo charges partner for 'Marketing Actions' campaign. Not from money movements. Taxable. NET amount. Used when marketing fees can't be processed through automated flows.

name: MKT_BOOST_TO_PARTNER
description: MANUAL IMPORT via CSV: Glovo charges partner for 'Marketing Boost' campaign. Not from money movements. Taxable. NET amount. Used when boost marketing fees need manual import.

name: MKT_CRM_TO_PARTNER
description: MANUAL IMPORT via CSV: Glovo charges partner for 'CRM Marketing' campaign. Not from money movements. Taxable. NET amount. Used when CRM marketing fees need manual import.

name: MKT_DFP_TO_PARTNER
description: MANUAL IMPORT via CSV: Glovo charges partner for 'DFP - Display & Featured Products' marketing. Not from money movements. Taxable. NET amount. Used when DFP marketing fees need manual import.

name: MKT_KEYWORDS_TO_PARTNER
description: MANUAL IMPORT via CSV: Glovo charges partner for 'Keywords Marketing' campaign. Not from money movements. Taxable. NET amount. Used when keyword bidding fees need manual import.

name: MKT_OTHER_TO_PARTNER
description: MANUAL IMPORT via CSV: Glovo charges partner for 'Other Marketing' campaigns not covered by other categories. Not from money movements. Taxable. NET amount. Catch-all for miscellaneous marketing fees.

name: MKT_POSITIONING_TO_PARTNER
description: MANUAL IMPORT via CSV: Glovo charges partner for 'Positioning/Placement' marketing (premium placements on the app). Not from money movements. Taxable. NET amount. Partner pays for better positioning in app.

name: MKT_SEARCH_TO_PARTNER
description: MANUAL IMPORT via CSV: Glovo charges partner for 'Search Marketing' campaign (better search rankings). Not from money movements. Taxable. NET amount. Partner pays to appear higher in search results.

name: OTHER_ADJUSTMENT_BY_COURIER
description: MANUAL IMPORT via CSV: Courier owes Glovo for various manual adjustments (fraud, product incidents, non-delivered orders, debts, etc.). Not from automated money movements. Non-taxable balance. Used when operators need to manually adjust courier accounts for special cases.

name: OTHER_ADJUSTMENT_TO_COURIER
description: MANUAL IMPORT via CSV: Glovo credits courier for various manual adjustments (debt settlements, corrections, compensations, etc.). Not from automated money movements. Non-taxable balance. Used when operators need to manually adjust courier accounts to settle debts or correct errors.
